    • validatePatchRequest

      public void validatePatchRequest(DataEnvelope data, RestUploadFile uploadFile)
      Description copied from class: RestElementResource
      Subclass hook for doing any request-level validation that needs to happen before applyPatchForEdit or processingUploadFileForUpdate is executed. This hook is primarily useful in the context of resources that can accept both data and uploadFile updates, such that applyPatchForPatch and processUploadFileForPatch might not be called.
      Overrides:
      validatePatchRequest in class RestElementResource
      Parameters:
      data - the request DataEnvelope, which may be null
      uploadFile - the request RestUploadFile, which may be null

      public abstract P buildParentFromElement(Document element)

    • init

      public final void init(String docId)
      This init is necessary because there is no /common/v1/documents path on the schema. Normally we would construct the parent first and then call init(parent, elementId), but since we don't have an endpoint for the parent, we can't construct the parent first. Instead, we call init(elementId) and this method constructs the parent TODO IA-928
